title: What is the relation between hypnotism and the new phenomenon experienced by the speaker?
first_phrase: In the final 200 tokens, the author explores the concept of hypnotism and introduces a new order of facts. He argues that hypnotism is not the same as somnambulism and that he uses different techniques than traditional hypnotists. The author then proceeds to showcase his methods with the help of Edouard Cornât and Donato. Cornât, a doctor, is asked to state his name but is unable to remember it after Donato touches his head. This experiment highlights the author's original approach to hypnotism, which differs from traditional methods developed by famous figures such as Mesmer and Braid.
content: En théorie c’est ce que pensaient, cinquante ans avant Braid, les contempteurs de Mesmer, entre-autres le baron d’H nin. Je produis un second ordre de faits — ceux- ci connus des magn Hiseurs — je vous en montrerai dans quelques instants. . On pourra alors discuter s’il y a sommeil ou non. Mais y eùt-il sommeil, que je n’admettrais point la qualification d’hypnotisme, car somnambulisme veut également dire sommeil — et le mot hypnotisme s’applique à des procédés très différents de ceux que j'emploie... Continuons!... Edouard Cornât (cité plus haut). Un docteur. — Ce jeune garçon a les yeux singulièrement écartés. Donato. — Tu sais parler maintenant, mon ami ? Cornât. — Comme vous voyez. Donato. — Dis-moi ton nom? (Il touche la tête du sujet.) Cornât se gratte le front et lève les yeux comme s il essayait de lire son nom au plafond. Un docteur. — Voyons... dis ton nom! Cornât. — Attendez donc... (il cherche à se souvenir.) Je ne sais pas ! Donato.
last_phrase: In conclusion, despite the theoretical debates and disagreements about Mesmerism, the experiments conducted by Edouard Cornât and Donato reveal fascinating facts about hypnotism and its impact on the human mind. The observation of the young boy's behavior offers insight into the different stages of hypnosis and the degree to which it can affect memory and communication skills.
